infoPlist.NSNotificationsUsageDescription: This app uses notifications to notify the user when they have walked past and collected a new note.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location when in use to track if a user passes a note and where they are if they post one.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to track if a user passes a note and where they are if they post one.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses location to track if a user passes a note and where they are if they post one.
